author: kskovpen
body:
#### PR description:

Adds BuToJPsiPrimeKToJPsiPiPiK and Psi2SToJPsiPiPi to the list of the upgrade wfs used in the release validation studies.

#### PR validation:

Tested on 11715.0 and 11716.0.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport.
title: Add B physics wfs to release validation
